alert.note: Alert for Colfax (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 8:14PM MDT until July 14 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Colfax County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 814 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Raton Crews Airport, or 17 miles southwest of Raton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Maxwell and Raton Crews Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 418 and 448. Highway 64 between Mile Markers 320 and 344, and between Mile Markers 358 and 370. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
